title: PBE
body: Can someone tell me how long it takes to be accepted on pbe? I signed up like 7 months ago and i didn't receive a mail.

replies.body: Took me a few years to get mine.

There is no set time or a guarantee that you will be accepted when you apply to the PBE.  Every single month we accept new people to be on the PBE, and if you haven't been chosen the last 7 times, it appears that you simply haven't been chosen yet.  Once applied, you are considered for every future month, but with how many people apply, there is no guarantee you'll get in :(

I wish I had better news, but I hope this info helps!
